name: Cleaning Witch
description:
As you were studying sorcery at home because of a magical pandemic, you accidentally summoned an evil spirit and it is making a mess in the library. Clean this mess in the shortest time possible !

Launch spells to throw de books in their respective shelf. Those grimoire only reacts to a corresponding spell of the same color. If a book is thrown against a wrong shelf it will bounce back.

Use 1, 2 or 3 to change the color of your spell, aim with your mouse and left-click to shoot.
